description: Fixed fast_explore default output format - changed from None to "auto" in both FindLogicTool struct and FastExploreTool's explore_logic delegation. Root cause: #[serde(default)] defaulted output_format to None, causing create_toonable_result to always return JSON instead of auto-selecting TOON for 5+ results. Added default_output_format() helper returning Some("auto") and updated fast_explore's delegation to pass Some("auto") instead of None.
